name: Verify Create Chatbot API when the chatbot name is invalid (Negative Case) -- @1.1

steps.name: Given User sends POST request to create a chatbot with an invalid chatbot name "None"
When the user receives the response
Then the status code should be 400 for bad request error
And the response should contain an error message "Bad Request"
And the message should contain "Invalid input:"

fullName: Create Chatbot API: Verify Create Chatbot API when the chatbot name is invalid (Negative Case)
